summary: {"what_changed":"New articles and updates were added to the Google Blog, including 'Ask a Techspert: What is inference?', 'Find out the latest Gemini updates with Gemini Drops', 'Turn your photos into videos in Gemini', 'Check out the first images of wildfires detected by FireSat', 'How we built one of the most ambitious datasets in brain activity research', 'Google Beam: Our AI-first 3D video communication platform', 'New in Gemini Code Assist: Agent Mode and IDE enhancements', 'Gemini CLI: your open-source AI agent', 'Listen to a conversation about the newest AI capabilities in Search', and 'Transform your photos into videos and remix your pics in Google Photos'","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Added new articles under the 'Gemini App' section","Added new articles under the 'Research' section","Added new articles under the 'Developers' section","Added new articles under the 'All the Latest' section"]}

{"what_changed":"Addition of new news articles and removal of old ones, update of featured news section","change_type":"update","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Added news article 'Thoughts on Americaâ€™s AI Action Plan'","Removed news article 'The need for transparency in Frontier AI'","Updated featured news section with new articles"]}

{"what_changed":"New articles and updates were added to the Google Blog, including 'Check out the first images of wildfires detected by FireSat', 'Transform your photos into videos and remix your pics in Google Photos', and 'Startups can apply now for the Google for Startups Gemini Founders Forum'.","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Addition of new research article about FireSat","Update to Google Photos with new features","Introduction of Google for Startups Gemini Founders Forum"]}

{"what_changed":"Addition of new links and reorganization of existing content, including the addition of a 'Use AI models' section and expansion of 'Configure custom instructions' and 'Configure content exclusion' sections","change_type":"addition/reorganization","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["New links added under 'How-tos' and 'Concepts' sections","Reorganization of 'Get started' and 'Concepts' sections","Addition of 'Use AI models' section","Expansion of 'Configure custom instructions' and 'Configure content exclusion' sections"]}

{"what_changed":"Introduction of GitHub Spark, a new feature for building and deploying intelligent apps","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Addition of GitHub Spark to the product lineup","Update to the Pro+ plan to include access to GitHub Spark"]}

{"what_changed":"New announcements and news articles were added to the newsroom section of the Anthropic website, including partnerships, product updates, and policy announcements.","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Added new news articles and announcements","Updated product information and features","Introduced new partnerships and collaborations"]}

{"what_changed":"The description of Perplexity Pro was updated to 'unlocks more ways to learn and get work done' and 'Upgrade your productivity and learning with unlimited Research, unlimited file uploads, exclusive Pro Perks and more'","change_type":"update","change_scale":"minor","specific_changes":["Updated Perplexity Pro description","No changes to pricing or features"]}
{"what_changed":"Removal of Voice feature","change_type":"removal","change_scale":"minor","specific_changes":["Voice feature button removed from the interface"]}

{"what_changed":"The content has changed from a security verification page to the OpenAI homepage, featuring various products, research, and company information.","change_type":"major overhaul","change_scale":"major","specific_changes":["Introduction of new products and features such as ChatGPT, Sora, and API Platform","Addition of research and company information sections","Removal of security verification page content","Update of the website's layout and design"]}

{"what_changed":"The content changed from a security verification page for www.perplexity.ai to a ChatGPT interface","change_type":"update","change_scale":"major","specific_changes":["Removal of security verification content","Introduction of ChatGPT interface","Addition of login and sign-up options","Inclusion of terms and privacy policy links"]}

{"what_changed":"The removal of the 'Set extension permissions' link under 'Administer' > 'Manage for organization' and the addition of 'About GitHub Copilot Chat' under 'Concepts'","change_type":"update","change_scale":"minor","specific_changes":["Removal of 'Set extension permissions' link","Addition of 'About GitHub Copilot Chat' under 'Concepts'"]}

{"what_changed":"Addition of a new policy announcement 'Build AI in America' and removal of several news articles","change_type":"update","change_scale":"significant","specific_changes":["Added new policy announcement 'Build AI in America'","Removed news articles from before July 21, 2025"]}

{"what_changed":"Introduction of Perplexity Pro and Max subscription plans with various features and pricing","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"major","specific_changes":["Introduction of Perplexity Pro with features like unlimited Pro Search, upgraded AI models, and collaborative spaces","Introduction of Perplexity Max with features like early access to new products, unlimited access to Perplexity Labs and Research, and priority support","Pricing for Perplexity Pro and Max plans","Introduction of exclusive features for Pro and Max subscribers"]}

{"what_changed":"Initial content creation for Midjourney documentation","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"major","specific_changes":["Introduction of help center with various sections","Addition of getting started guide","Documentation section for making the most of Midjourney","Billing support section","Policies and guidelines including terms of service, privacy policy, data deletion and privacy FAQ, and community guidelines","Links to Midjourney website and Discord server"]}

{"what_changed":"Introduction of a new pricing page with detailed plan comparisons and features","change_type":"addition","change_scale":"major","specific_changes":["Introduction of four subscription tiers: Basic, Standard, Pro, and Mega","Detailed comparison of plan features, including GPU time, image and video generation, and stealth mode","Information on pricing, including monthly and annual rates, and a 20% discount for annual commitments"]}
